The package for Okapi News Tracker

The package for Okapi News Tracker

okapi_news(news, number)

Arguments

news
type of of news to track for articles of Okapi
number
is the number of days ago

Value

dashboard with the title of the article and some statistics about followers and comments

Details

An implementation of dashboard to follow the lifecycle of articles posted on the website of Okapi Radio i.e followers and comments

Author

Jean Marie Cimula

Built by staticdocs. Styled with Bootstrap 3.
